ygData.subject: RE: Stein Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You re trying to cast it over the counter, right?  I have no clue why, but it won t work if you do.  You have to go around or over the counter to cast it.
ygData.messageBody:
> I've never had Alliance "resisted", but when I cast on some NPC's it says I
> cannot see my target even though I'm standing right next to them, and the
> spell
> doesn't take hold.. I think I read somewhere that Alliance is a non aggro
> spell
> as well, so it shouldn't cause them to attack. I'll have to check into that
> one
> again. :)
>
> Ezrae
>
> Rich Hitz wrote:
>
>

You're trying to cast it over the counter, right? I have no clue why, but it
won't work if you do. You have to go around or over the counter to cast it.

I have cast alliance of everything from random monsters (which did nothing) to
even that Ogre Paladin. I've never been attacked because of it.

Tinik
